status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine remained in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, producing very steady power (mean ~0.975 with negligible variability) despite elevated and variable winds (mean ~18.0, max 33.9; tagged high_wind). Operationally, pitch averaged ~14.84 with modest yaw misalignment (~8.15), while rotor speed showed no variability and generator speed varied slightly. Anomalies/patterns to note are the consistently negative power residual (mean −0.107) and the combination of high wind variability with essentially flat power output.
